sql.query: SELECT INWARD_REF_NO, to_char(Inward_Date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as Inward_Date, INWARD_LAR,INWARD_SOL_ID,INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,INWARD_REGION_NAME,INWARD_CUST_ID, INWARD_BORROWER_NAME, INWARD_TYPEOFINWARD, INWARD_DTLSOFINWARDRECEIVED, INWARD_REMARKS,INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,INWARD_CREATED_DATE, INWARD_CREATED_BY,INWARD_MODIFIED_BY,INWARD_MODIFIED_DT,ACT_FLG from INWARD where (trunc(sysdate) - trunc(INWARD_CREATED_DATE)) <='7' order by INWARD_REF_NO desc

INSERT INTO INWARD (INWARD_REF_NO, INWARD_DATE, INWARD_LAR,INWARD_SOL_ID,INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,INWARD_REGION_NAME,INWARD_CUST_ID, INWARD_BORROWER_NAME, INWARD_TYPEOFINWARD, INWARD_DTLSOFINWARDRECEIVED, INWARD_REMARKS,INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,INWARD_CREATED_DATE, INWARD_CREATED_BY,ACT_FLG) VALUES (?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?)

update INWARD set INWARD_DATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), INWARD_LAR=?, INWARD_SOL_ID=?, INWARD_BRANCH_NAME=?, INWARD_REGION_NAME=?, INWARD_CUST_ID=?, INWARD_BORROWER_NAME=?, INWARD_TYPEOFINWARD=?, INWARD_DTLSOFINWARDRECEIVED=?, INWARD_REMARKS=?, INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER =? , INWARD_MODIFIED_BY=?,INWARD_MODIFIED_DT=sysdate,ACT_FLG=? where INWARD_REF_NO=?

SELECT INWARD_REF_NO, to_char(Inward_Date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as Inward_Date,case when (trunc(sysdate-1)-trunc(Inward_Date)) < 0 then 0 else (trunc(sysdate-1)-trunc(Inward_Date)) end datediff, INWARD_LAR,INWARD_SOL_ID,INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,INWARD_REGION_NAME,INWARD_CUST_ID, INWARD_BORROWER_NAME, INWARD_TYPEOFINWARD, INWARD_DTLSOFINWARDRECEIVED, INWARD_REMARKS,INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,INWARD_CREATED_DATE, INWARD_CREATED_BY,INWARD_MODIFIED_BY,INWARD_MODIFIED_DT from INWARD where INWARD_TYPEOFINWARD='1' and ACT_FLG='Y' and INWARD_REF_NO NOT in (Select INWARD_REF_NO from INWARD_OUTWARDPROPOSAL)

SELECT OUTWARD_REF_NO, to_char(OUTWARD_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as OUTWARD_DATE, OUTWARD_LAR,OUTWARD_SOL_ID,OUTWARD_BRANCH_NAME,OUTWARD_REGION_NAME,OUTWARD_CUST_ID, OUTWARD_BORROWER_NAME, OUTWARD_TYPEOFINWARD, OUTWARD_DTLSOFINWARDRECEIVED, OUTWARD_REMARKS,OUTWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,OUTWARD_CREATED_DATE, OUTWARD_CREATED_BY,OUTWARD_MODIFIED_BY,OUTWARD_MODIFIED_DT,OUTWARD_ACT_FLG from OUTWARD where (trunc(sysdate) - trunc(OUTWARD_CREATED_DATE)) <='7' order by OUTWARD_REF_NO desc

INSERT INTO OUTWARD (OUTWARD_REF_NO, OUTWARD_DATE, OUTWARD_LAR,OUTWARD_SOL_ID,OUTWARD_BRANCH_NAME,OUTWARD_REGION_NAME,OUTWARD_CUST_ID, OUTWARD_BORROWER_NAME, OUTWARD_TYPEOFINWARD, OUTWARD_DTLSOFINWARDRECEIVED, OUTWARD_REMARKS,OUTWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,OUTWARD_CREATED_DATE, OUTWARD_CREATED_BY,OUTWARD_ACT_FLG) VALUES (?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?)

update OUTWARD set OUTWARD_DATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), OUTWARD_LAR=?, OUTWARD_SOL_ID=?, OUTWARD_BRANCH_NAME=?, OUTWARD_REGION_NAME=?, OUTWARD_CUST_ID=?, OUTWARD_BORROWER_NAME=?, OUTWARD_TYPEOFINWARD=?, OUTWARD_DTLSOFINWARDRECEIVED=?, OUTWARD_REMARKS=?, OUTWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER =? , OUTWARD_MODIFIED_BY=?,OUTWARD_MODIFIED_DT=sysdate,OUTWARD_ACT_FLG=? where OUTWARD_REF_NO=?
select ORG_SCODE, ORG_NAME , (select ORG_NAME from organisations b where b.ORG_CODE like SUBSTR(a.ORG_CODE,1,6)||'%' and b.ORG_LEVEL='R' ) as REGIONAL_OFFICE from ORGANISATIONS a order by a.ORG_SCODE
select max(INWARD_REF_NO) + 1 as maxval from INWARD

INSERT INTO INWARD_OUTWARDPROPOSAL(INWARD_REF_NO,PROPOSED_FBLIMIT,PROPOSED_NFBLIMIT,TOTAL_EXPOSURE, EXPOSURE_BRACKET,PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT,LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME,STATUS_OFPROPOSAL,TAT,REMARKS,TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL, DUE_DATEOF_WC,SANCTIONING_AUTH,SANCTION_REF_NO,SANCTION_DATE,LODGE_REF_NO, LODGE_DATE, DROPPED_REF_NO, DROPPED_DATE, DEFFERRED_DETAILS, DEFERRED_DATE, INOUT_PROPOSALCREATED_DATE, INOUT_PROPOSALCREATED_BY,ACT_FLAG_PRO) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),SYSDATE,?,?)

UPDATE INWARD_OUTWARDPROPOSAL SET PROPOSED_FBLIMIT=?,PROPOSED_NFBLIMIT=?,TOTAL_EXPOSURE=?,EXPOSURE_BRACKET=?,PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT=?, LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME=?,STATUS_OFPROPOSAL=?,TAT=?,REMARKS=?,TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL=?,DUE_DATEOF_WC=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),SANCTIONING_AUTH=?, SANCTION_REF_NO=?,SANCTION_DATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),LODGE_REF_NO=?,LODGE_DATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),DROPPED_REF_NO=?, DROPPED_DATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),DEFFERRED_DETAILS=?,DEFERRED_DATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), INOUT_PROPOSALMODIFIED_BY=?, INOUT_PROPOSALMODIFIED_DT=SYSDATE,ACT_FLAG_PRO=? WHERE INWARD_REF_NO=?
delete from INWARD_OUTWARDPROPOSAL where INWARD_REF_NO =?

SELECT A.INWARD_REF_NO, TO_CHAR(INWARD_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as INWARD_DATE,INWARD_LAR,INWARD_SOL_ID,PROPOSED_FBLIMIT,INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,INWARD_REGION_NAME,INWARD_CUST_ID, PROPOSED_NFBLIMIT,INWARD_BORROWER_NAME, TOTAL_EXPOSURE,EXPOSURE_BRACKET, PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT, LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME, STATUS_OFPROPOSAL,TAT,INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER, REMARKS,TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL,TO_CHAR(DUE_DATEOF_WC,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DUE_DATEOF_WC , SANCTIONING_AUTH,SANCTION_REF_NO, TO_CHAR(SANCTION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS SANCTION_DATE,LODGE_REF_NO,TO_CHAR(LODGE_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS LODGE_DATE,DROPPED_REF_NO,TO_CHAR(DROPPED_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as DROPPED_DATE, DEFFERRED_DETAILS,TO_CHAR(DEFERRED_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as DEFERRED_DATE,INOUT_PROPOSALCREATED_DATE, INOUT_PROPOSALCREATED_BY, INOUT_PROPOSALMODIFIED_BY, INOUT_PROPOSALMODIFIED_DT,ACT_FLAG_PRO FROM INWARD_OUTWARDPROPOSAL A,INWARD B where A.INWARD_REF_NO=B.INWARD_REF_NO

SELECT INWARD_REF_NO, to_char(Inward_Date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as Inward_Date,case when (trunc(sysdate-1)-trunc(Inward_Date)) < 0 then 0 else (trunc(sysdate-1)-trunc(Inward_Date)) end datediff, INWARD_LAR,INWARD_SOL_ID,INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,INWARD_REGION_NAME,INWARD_CUST_ID, INWARD_BORROWER_NAME, INWARD_TYPEOFINWARD, INWARD_DTLSOFINWARDRECEIVED, INWARD_REMARKS,INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,INWARD_CREATED_DATE, INWARD_CREATED_BY,INWARD_MODIFIED_BY,INWARD_MODIFIED_DT from INWARD where INWARD_TYPEOFINWARD='3' and ACT_FLG='Y' and INWARD_REF_NO NOT in (Select SN_INWARD_REF_NO from INWARD_OUTWARDSHORTNOTE)

INSERT INTO INWARD_OUTWARDSHORTNOTE(SN_INWARD_REF_NO,SN_FBLIMIT, SN_NFBLIMIT,SN_TOTAL_EXPOSURE,SN_EXPOSURE_BRACKET, SN_HANDLED_AT,SN_LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME, SN_STATUS_OFPROPOSAL,SN_TAT,SN_REMARKS,SN_TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL,SN_DUE_DATEOF_WC, SN_SANCTIONING_AUTH,SN_SANCTION_REF_NO,SN_SANCTION_DATE,SN_LODGE_REF_NO,SN_LODGE_DATE,SN_DROPPED_REF_NO,SN_DROPPED_DATE, SN_DEFFERRED_DETAILS,SN_DEFERRED_DATE,INOUT_SN_CREATED_DATE,INOUT_SN_CREATED_BY,ACT_FLAG_SN) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), ?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?, to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),SYSDATE,?,?)

UPDATE INWARD_OUTWARDSHORTNOTE SET SN_FBLIMIT=?, SN_NFBLIMIT=?,SN_TOTAL_EXPOSURE=?,SN_EXPOSURE_BRACKET=?, SN_HANDLED_AT=?,SN_LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME=?, SN_STATUS_OFPROPOSAL=?,SN_TAT=?,SN_REMARKS=?,SN_TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL=?, SN_DUE_DATEOF_WC=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),SN_SANCTIONING_AUTH=?,SN_SANCTION_REF_NO=?,SN_SANCTION_DATE=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), SN_LODGE_REF_NO=?,SN_LODGE_DATE=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),SN_DROPPED_REF_NO=?,SN_DROPPED_DATE=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), SN_DEFFERRED_DETAILS=?,SN_DEFERRED_DATE=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),INOUT_SN_MODIFIED_BY=?, INOUT_SN_MODIFIED_DT=SYSDATE, ACT_FLAG_SN=? WHERE SN_INWARD_REF_NO=?

SELECT S.SN_INWARD_REF_NO, TO_CHAR(INWARD_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as INWARD_DATE,INWARD_LAR,INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,INWARD_SOL_ID,INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,INWARD_REGION_NAME,INWARD_CUST_ID, INWARD_BORROWER_NAME, SN_FBLIMIT,SN_NFBLIMIT,SN_TOTAL_EXPOSURE,SN_EXPOSURE_BRACKET,SN_HANDLED_AT,SN_LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME, SN_STATUS_OFPROPOSAL,SN_TAT,SN_REMARKS,SN_TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL,TO_CHAR(SN_DUE_DATEOF_WC,'DD/MM/YYYY') as SN_DUE_DATEOF_WC, SN_SANCTIONING_AUTH,SN_SANCTION_REF_NO,TO_CHAR(SN_SANCTION_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as SN_SANCTION_DATE, SN_LODGE_REF_NO,TO_CHAR(SN_LODGE_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as SN_LODGE_DATE,SN_DROPPED_REF_NO,TO_CHAR(SN_DROPPED_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as SN_DROPPED_DATE, SN_DEFFERRED_DETAILS,TO_CHAR(SN_DEFERRED_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as SN_DEFERRED_DATE,INOUT_SN_CREATED_DATE, INOUT_SN_CREATED_BY,INOUT_SN_MODIFIED_BY,INOUT_SN_MODIFIED_DT,ACT_FLAG_SN FROM INWARD_OUTWARDSHORTNOTE S, INWARD I WHERE S.SN_INWARD_REF_NO=I.INWARD_REF_NO
delete from INWARD_OUTWARDSHORTNOTE where SN_INWARD_REF_NO =?
select max(OUTWARD_REF_NO) + 1 as maxval from OUTWARD

SELECT INWARD_REF_NO, to_char(Inward_Date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as Inward_Date,case when (trunc(sysdate-1)-trunc(Inward_Date)) < 0 then 0 else (trunc(sysdate-1)-trunc(Inward_Date)) end datediff, INWARD_LAR,INWARD_SOL_ID,INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,INWARD_REGION_NAME,INWARD_CUST_ID, INWARD_BORROWER_NAME, INWARD_TYPEOFINWARD, INWARD_DTLSOFINWARDRECEIVED, INWARD_REMARKS,INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,INWARD_CREATED_DATE, INWARD_CREATED_BY,INWARD_MODIFIED_BY,INWARD_MODIFIED_DT from INWARD where INWARD_TYPEOFINWARD='2' and ACT_FLG='Y' and INWARD_REF_NO NOT in (Select CE_INWARD_REF_NO from INWARD_OUTWARDCREDITENQ)

SELECT C.CE_INWARD_REF_NO, TO_CHAR(INWARD_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as INWARD_DATE,INWARD_LAR,INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,INWARD_SOL_ID,INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,INWARD_REGION_NAME,INWARD_CUST_ID, INWARD_BORROWER_NAME,CE_FBLIMIT,CE_NFBLIMIT,CE_TOTAL_EXPOSURE,CE_EXPOSURE_BRACKET,CE_HANDLED_AT,TO_CHAR(CE_CMSDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CE_CMSDATE,CE_LMSREFNO, CE_CMSDECISION,CE_REMARKS,ACT_FLAG_SN FROM INWARD_OUTWARDCREDITENQ C, INWARD I WHERE C.CE_INWARD_REF_NO=I.INWARD_REF_NO
delete from INWARD_OUTWARDCREDITENQ where CE_INWARD_REF_NO =?

INSERT INTO INWARD_OUTWARDCREDITENQ(CE_INWARD_REF_NO,CE_FBLIMIT, CE_NFBLIMIT,CE_TOTAL_EXPOSURE,CE_EXPOSURE_BRACKET, CE_HANDLED_AT,CE_CMSDATE,CE_LMSREFNO,CE_CMSDECISION,CE_REMARKS,INOUT_CE_CREATED_DATE,INOUT_CE_CREATED_BY,ACT_FLAG_SN) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), ?,?,?,SYSDATE,?,?)

UPDATE INWARD_OUTWARDCREDITENQ SET CE_FBLIMIT=?, CE_NFBLIMIT=?,CE_TOTAL_EXPOSURE=?,CE_EXPOSURE_BRACKET=?, CE_HANDLED_AT=?,CE_CMSDATE=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), CE_LMSREFNO=?,CE_CMSDECISION=?,CE_REMARKS=?,INOUT_CE_MODIFIED_BY=?, INOUT_CE_MODIFIED_DT=SYSDATE, ACT_FLAG_SN=? WHERE CE_INWARD_REF_NO=?

SELECT P.INWARD_REF_NO,TO_CHAR(I.INWARD_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INWARD_DATE,I.INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,I.INWARD_SOL_ID,I.INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,I.INWARD_REGION_NAME, I.INWARD_CUST_ID, I.INWARD_BORROWER_NAME,PROPOSED_FBLIMIT, PROPOSED_NFBLIMIT,TOTAL_EXPOSURE,EXPOSURE_BRACKET,PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT,LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME, STATUS_OFPROPOSAL,TAT,LODGE_REF_NO,TO_CHAR(LODGE_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS LODGE_DATE FROM INWARD_OUTWARDPROPOSAL P, INWARD I WHERE P.INWARD_REF_NO=I.INWARD_REF_NO AND STATUS_OFPROPOSAL='7' AND ACT_FLAG_PRO ='Y' AND P.INWARD_REF_NO NOT IN ( SELECT LP_INWARD_REF_NO FROM INWARD_OUTWARDLODGEDPROPOSAL)
delete from INWARD_OUTWARDLODGEDPROPOSAL where LP_INWARD_REF_NO =?

INSERT INTO INWARD_OUTWARDLODGEDPROPOSAL(LP_INWARD_REF_NO, LP_LODGEDREASON, LP_REMARKS, LP_REMARKSFLAG,LP_UNLODGE_DATE, LP_DROPEDFLAG, LP_DROPPED_REFNO,LP_DROPPEDDATE, INOUT_LP_CREATED_DATE, INOUT_LP_CREATED_BY,ACT_FLAG_LPPRO) values (?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),SYSDATE,?,?)

UPDATE INWARD_OUTWARDLODGEDPROPOSAL SET LP_LODGEDREASON=?, LP_REMARKS=?, LP_REMARKSFLAG=?,LP_UNLODGE_DATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), LP_DROPEDFLAG=?, LP_DROPPED_REFNO=?,LP_DROPPEDDATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), INOUT_LP_MODIFIED_BY=?,INOUT_LP_MODIFIED_DT=SYSDATE,ACT_FLAG_LPPRO=? WHERE LP_INWARD_REF_NO=?

SELECT LP_INWARD_REF_NO,TO_CHAR(I.INWARD_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INWARD_DATE,I.INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,I.INWARD_SOL_ID,I.INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,I.INWARD_REGION_NAME, I.INWARD_CUST_ID, I.INWARD_BORROWER_NAME,PROPOSED_FBLIMIT, PROPOSED_NFBLIMIT,TOTAL_EXPOSURE,EXPOSURE_BRACKET,PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT,LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME, STATUS_OFPROPOSAL,TAT,LODGE_REF_NO,TO_CHAR(LODGE_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS LODGE_DATE,LP_LODGEDREASON,LP_REMARKS,LP_REMARKSFLAG, TO_CHAR(LP_UNLODGE_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS LP_UNLODGE_DATE,LP_DROPEDFLAG, LP_DROPPED_REFNO,TO_CHAR(LP_DROPPEDDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS LP_DROPPEDDATE,ACT_FLAG_LPPRO FROM INWARD_OUTWARDPROPOSAL P, INWARD I,INWARD_OUTWARDLODGEDPROPOSAL WHERE P.INWARD_REF_NO=I.INWARD_REF_NO AND P.INWARD_REF_NO=LP_INWARD_REF_NO

SELECT P.INWARD_REF_NO,TO_CHAR(I.INWARD_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INWARD_DATE,I.INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,I.INWARD_SOL_ID,I.INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,I.INWARD_REGION_NAME, I.INWARD_CUST_ID, I.INWARD_BORROWER_NAME,PROPOSED_FBLIMIT, PROPOSED_NFBLIMIT,TOTAL_EXPOSURE,EXPOSURE_BRACKET,PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT,LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME, STATUS_OFPROPOSAL,TAT,DROPPED_REF_NO,TO_CHAR(DROPPED_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DROPPED_DATE FROM INWARD_OUTWARDPROPOSAL P, INWARD I WHERE P.INWARD_REF_NO=I.INWARD_REF_NO AND STATUS_OFPROPOSAL='8' AND ACT_FLAG_PRO ='Y' AND P.INWARD_REF_NO NOT IN ( SELECT DP_INWARD_REF_NO FROM INWARD_OUTWARDDROPPEDPROPOSAL)
delete from INWARD_OUTWARDDROPPEDPROPOSAL where DP_INWARD_REF_NO =?
INSERT INTO INWARD_OUTWARDDROPPEDPROPOSAL(DP_INWARD_REF_NO, DP_REASONFORDROP, DP_REMARKS, INOUT_DP_CREATED_DATE, INOUT_DP_CREATED_BY,ACT_FLAG_LPPRO) values (?,?,?,SYSDATE,?,?)
UPDATE INWARD_OUTWARDDROPPEDPROPOSAL SET DP_REASONFORDROP=?, DP_REMARKS=?, INOUT_DP_MODIFIED_BY=?,INOUT_DP_MODIFIED_DT=SYSDATE,ACT_FLAG_LPPRO=? WHERE DP_INWARD_REF_NO=?

SELECT DP_INWARD_REF_NO,TO_CHAR(I.INWARD_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INWARD_DATE,I.INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,I.INWARD_SOL_ID,I.INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,I.INWARD_REGION_NAME, I.INWARD_CUST_ID, I.INWARD_BORROWER_NAME,PROPOSED_FBLIMIT, PROPOSED_NFBLIMIT,TOTAL_EXPOSURE,EXPOSURE_BRACKET,PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT,LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME, STATUS_OFPROPOSAL,TAT,DROPPED_REF_NO,TO_CHAR(DROPPED_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DROPPED_DATE,DP_REASONFORDROP,DP_REMARKS ,ACT_FLAG_LPPRO FROM INWARD_OUTWARDPROPOSAL P, INWARD I,INWARD_OUTWARDDROPPEDPROPOSAL WHERE P.INWARD_REF_NO=I.INWARD_REF_NO AND P.INWARD_REF_NO=DP_INWARD_REF_NO

Select I.INWARD_REF_NO,to_char(Inward_Date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as Inward_Date,INWARD_LAR,INWARD_SOL_ID,INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,INWARD_REGION_NAME,INWARD_CUST_ID, INWARD_BORROWER_NAME,INWARD_DTLSOFINWARDRECEIVED, INWARD_REMARKS,decode(INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,'1','NTB','2','ETB','3','Others',INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER) as INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER ,PROPOSED_FBLIMIT,PROPOSED_NFBLIMIT, TOTAL_EXPOSURE,decode(EXPOSURE_BRACKET,'1','Below 5 Cr','2','5-15 Cr','3','Above 15 Cr',EXPOSURE_BRACKET) as EXPOSURE_BRACKET,decode(PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT,'M','Mangaluru','B','Bengaluru',PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT) as PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT, LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME,decode(STATUS_OFPROPOSAL,'1','Query yet to be raised','2','Reply yet to be received','3','Under circulation','4','Partial reply received', '5','Under Process','6','Sanctioned','7','Lodged','8','Dropped',STATUS_OFPROPOSAL) as STATUS_OFPROPOSAL ,TAT,REMARKS,decode(TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL,'1','Fresh','2','Renewal','3','Renewal with Enhancement',TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL) as TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL,to_char(DUE_DATEOF_WC,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DUE_DATEOF_WC ,SANCTIONING_AUTH,SANCTION_REF_NO,to_char(SANCTION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SANCTION_DATE,LODGE_REF_NO, to_char(LODGE_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as LODGE_DATE ,DROPPED_REF_NO,to_char(DROPPED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DROPPED_DATE,DEFFERRED_DETAILS,INOUT_PROPOSALCREATED_BY,to_char(INOUT_PROPOSALCREATED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as INOUT_PROPOSALCREATED_DATE, to_char(DEFERRED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DEFERRED_DATE from INWARD_OUTWARDPROPOSAL P,INWARD I where I.INWARD_REF_NO=P.INWARD_REF_NO and INWARD_TYPEOFINWARD='^' and trunc(INOUT_PROPOSALCREATED_DATE) >= to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and trunc(INOUT_PROPOSALCREATED_DATE) <= to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') ^
Select ORG_SCODE from ORGANISATIONS ^

Select I.INWARD_REF_NO,to_char(Inward_Date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as Inward_Date,INWARD_LAR,INWARD_SOL_ID,INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,INWARD_REGION_NAME,INWARD_CUST_ID, INWARD_BORROWER_NAME,INWARD_DTLSOFINWARDRECEIVED, INWARD_REMARKS,decode(INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,'1','NTB','2','ETB','3','Others',INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER) as INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER ,CE_LMSREFNO,CE_FBLIMIT,CE_NFBLIMIT,CE_TOTAL_EXPOSURE,decode(CE_EXPOSURE_BRACKET,'1','Below 5 Cr','2','5-15 Cr','3','Above 15 Cr',CE_EXPOSURE_BRACKET) as CE_EXPOSURE_BRACKET,decode(CE_HANDLED_AT,'M','Mangaluru','B','Bengaluru',CE_HANDLED_AT) as CE_HANDLED_AT,to_char(CE_CMSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CE_CMSDATE,CE_CMSDECISION ,CE_REMARKS,to_char(INOUT_CE_CREATED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as INOUT_CE_CREATED_DATE,INOUT_CE_CREATED_BY from INWARD I , INWARD_OUTWARDCREDITENQ C where I.INWARD_REF_NO=C.CE_INWARD_REF_NO and INWARD_TYPEOFINWARD='^' and trunc(INOUT_CE_CREATED_DATE) >= to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and trunc(INOUT_CE_CREATED_DATE) <= to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') ^

Select I.INWARD_REF_NO,to_char(Inward_Date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as Inward_Date,INWARD_LAR,INWARD_SOL_ID,INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,INWARD_REGION_NAME,INWARD_CUST_ID, INWARD_BORROWER_NAME,INWARD_DTLSOFINWARDRECEIVED, INWARD_REMARKS,decode(INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,'1','NTB','2','ETB','3','Others',INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER) as INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER ,SN_FBLIMIT as PROPOSED_FBLIMIT,SN_NFBLIMIT as PROPOSED_NFBLIMIT, SN_TOTAL_EXPOSURE as TOTAL_EXPOSURE,decode(SN_EXPOSURE_BRACKET,'1','Below 5 Cr','2','5-15 Cr','3','Above 15 Cr',SN_EXPOSURE_BRACKET) as EXPOSURE_BRACKET,decode(SN_HANDLED_AT,'M','Mangaluru','B','Bengaluru',SN_HANDLED_AT) as PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT, SN_LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME as LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME,decode(SN_STATUS_OFPROPOSAL,'1','Query yet to be raised','2','Reply yet to be received','3','Under circulation','4','Partial reply received', '5','Under Process','6','Sanctioned','7','Lodged','8','Dropped',SN_STATUS_OFPROPOSAL) as STATUS_OFPROPOSAL ,SN_TAT as TAT,SN_REMARKS as REMARKS,decode(SN_TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL,'1','Fresh','2','Renewal','3','Renewal with Enhancement',SN_TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL) as TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL,to_char(SN_DUE_DATEOF_WC,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DUE_DATEOF_WC ,SN_SANCTIONING_AUTH as SANCTIONING_AUTH,SN_SANCTION_REF_NO as SANCTION_REF_NO, to_char(SN_SANCTION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SANCTION_DATE,SN_LODGE_REF_NO as LODGE_REF_NO, to_char(SN_LODGE_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as LODGE_DATE ,SN_DROPPED_REF_NO as DROPPED_REF_NO,to_char(SN_DROPPED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DROPPED_DATE,SN_DEFFERRED_DETAILS as DEFFERRED_DETAILS, INOUT_SN_CREATED_BY as INOUT_PROPOSALCREATED_BY,to_char(INOUT_SN_CREATED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as INOUT_PROPOSALCREATED_DATE, to_char(SN_DEFERRED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DEFERRED_DATE from INWARD_OUTWARDSHORTNOTE P,INWARD I where I.INWARD_REF_NO=P.SN_INWARD_REF_NO and INWARD_TYPEOFINWARD='^' and trunc(INOUT_SN_CREATED_DATE) >= to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and trunc(INOUT_SN_CREATED_DATE) <= to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') ^

SELECT P.INWARD_REF_NO,TO_CHAR(I.INWARD_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INWARD_DATE,decode(I.INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,'1','NTB','2','ETB','3','Others',I.INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER) as INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER ,I.INWARD_SOL_ID, I.INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,I.INWARD_REGION_NAME, I.INWARD_CUST_ID, I.INWARD_BORROWER_NAME,PROPOSED_FBLIMIT, PROPOSED_NFBLIMIT,TOTAL_EXPOSURE,decode(EXPOSURE_BRACKET,'1','Below 5 Cr','2','5-15 Cr','3','Above 15 Cr',EXPOSURE_BRACKET) as EXPOSURE_BRACKET,decode(PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT,'M','Mangaluru','B','Bengaluru',PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT) as PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT,LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME, STATUS_OFPROPOSAL,TAT,LODGE_REF_NO,TO_CHAR(LODGE_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS LODGE_DATE,LP_LODGEDREASON,LP_REMARKS ,decode(LP_REMARKSFLAG,'Y','YES','N','NO',LP_REMARKSFLAG) as LP_REMARKSFLAG,TO_CHAR(LP_UNLODGE_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS LP_UNLODGE_DATE, decode(LP_DROPEDFLAG,'Y','YES','N','NO',LP_DROPEDFLAG) as LP_DROPEDFLAG,LP_DROPPED_REFNO,TO_CHAR(LP_DROPPEDDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS LP_DROPPEDDATE FROM INWARD_OUTWARDPROPOSAL P, INWARD_OUTWARDLODGEDPROPOSAL O, INWARD I WHERE P.INWARD_REF_NO=I.INWARD_REF_NO and O.LP_INWARD_REF_NO=P.INWARD_REF_NO AND STATUS_OFPROPOSAL='7' AND trunc(INOUT_LP_CREATED_DATE) >= to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and trunc(INOUT_LP_CREATED_DATE) <= to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') ^

SELECT P.INWARD_REF_NO,TO_CHAR(I.INWARD_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INWARD_DATE,decode(I.INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,'1','NTB','2','ETB','3','Others',I.INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER) as INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,I.INWARD_SOL_ID,I.INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,I.INWARD_REGION_NAME, I.INWARD_CUST_ID, I.INWARD_BORROWER_NAME,PROPOSED_FBLIMIT, PROPOSED_NFBLIMIT,TOTAL_EXPOSURE,decode(EXPOSURE_BRACKET,'1','Below 5 Cr','2','5-15 Cr','3','Above 15 Cr',EXPOSURE_BRACKET) as EXPOSURE_BRACKET,decode(PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT,'M','Mangaluru','B','Bengaluru',PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT) as PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT,LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME, STATUS_OFPROPOSAL,TAT,DROPPED_REF_NO,TO_CHAR(DROPPED_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DROPPED_DATE,DP_REASONFORDROP,DP_REMARKS FROM INWARD_OUTWARDPROPOSAL P, INWARD I, INWARD_OUTWARDDROPPEDPROPOSAL D WHERE P.INWARD_REF_NO=I.INWARD_REF_NO AND STATUS_OFPROPOSAL='8' And trunc(D.INOUT_DP_CREATED_DATE) >= to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and trunc(D.INOUT_DP_CREATED_DATE) <= to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') ^

Select I.INWARD_REF_NO,to_char(Inward_Date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as Inward_Date,INWARD_LAR,INWARD_SOL_ID,INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,INWARD_REGION_NAME,INWARD_CUST_ID, INWARD_BORROWER_NAME,INWARD_DTLSOFINWARDRECEIVED, INWARD_REMARKS,decode(INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,'1','NTB','2','ETB','3','Others',INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER) as INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER ,SN_FBLIMIT as PROPOSED_FBLIMIT,SN_NFBLIMIT as PROPOSED_NFBLIMIT, SN_TOTAL_EXPOSURE as TOTAL_EXPOSURE,decode(SN_EXPOSURE_BRACKET,'1','Below 5 Cr','2','5-15 Cr','3','Above 15 Cr',SN_EXPOSURE_BRACKET) as EXPOSURE_BRACKET,decode(SN_HANDLED_AT,'M','Mangaluru','B','Bengaluru',SN_HANDLED_AT) as PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT, SN_LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME as LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME,decode(SN_STATUS_OFPROPOSAL,'1','Query yet to be raised','2','Reply yet to be received','3','Under circulation','4','Partial reply received', '5','Under Process','6','Sanctioned','7','Lodged','8','Dropped',SN_STATUS_OFPROPOSAL) as STATUS_OFPROPOSAL ,SN_TAT as TAT,SN_REMARKS as REMARKS,decode(SN_TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL,'1','Fresh','2','Renewal','3','Renewal with Enhancement',SN_TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL) as TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL,to_char(SN_DUE_DATEOF_WC,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DUE_DATEOF_WC ,SN_SANCTIONING_AUTH as SANCTIONING_AUTH,SN_SANCTION_REF_NO as SANCTION_REF_NO, to_char(SN_SANCTION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SANCTION_DATE,SN_LODGE_REF_NO as LODGE_REF_NO, to_char(SN_LODGE_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as LODGE_DATE ,SN_DROPPED_REF_NO as DROPPED_REF_NO,to_char(SN_DROPPED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DROPPED_DATE,SN_DEFFERRED_DETAILS as DEFFERRED_DETAILS, INOUT_SN_CREATED_BY as INOUT_PROPOSALCREATED_BY,to_char(INOUT_SN_CREATED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as INOUT_PROPOSALCREATED_DATE, to_char(SN_DEFERRED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DEFERRED_DATE from INWARD_OUTWARDSHORTNOTE P,INWARD I where I.INWARD_REF_NO=P.SN_INWARD_REF_NO and INWARD_TYPEOFINWARD='^' ^

Select I.INWARD_REF_NO,to_char(Inward_Date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as Inward_Date,INWARD_LAR,INWARD_SOL_ID,INWARD_BRANCH_NAME,INWARD_REGION_NAME,INWARD_CUST_ID, INWARD_BORROWER_NAME,INWARD_DTLSOFINWARDRECEIVED, INWARD_REMARKS,decode(INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER,'1','NTB','2','ETB','3','Others',INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER) as INWARD_TYPEOFBORROWER ,PROPOSED_FBLIMIT,PROPOSED_NFBLIMIT, TOTAL_EXPOSURE,decode(EXPOSURE_BRACKET,'1','Below 5 Cr','2','5-15 Cr','3','Above 15 Cr',EXPOSURE_BRACKET) as EXPOSURE_BRACKET,decode(PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT,'M','Mangaluru','B','Bengaluru',PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT) as PROPOSAL_HANDLED_AT, LOAN_PROCESSOFFICERNAME,decode(STATUS_OFPROPOSAL,'1','Query yet to be raised','2','Reply yet to be received','3','Under circulation','4','Partial reply received', '5','Under Process','6','Sanctioned','7','Lodged','8','Dropped',STATUS_OFPROPOSAL) as STATUS_OFPROPOSAL ,TAT,REMARKS,decode(TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL,'1','Fresh','2','Renewal','3','Renewal with Enhancement',TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL) as TYPE_OF_PROPOSAL,to_char(DUE_DATEOF_WC,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DUE_DATEOF_WC ,SANCTIONING_AUTH,SANCTION_REF_NO,to_char(SANCTION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as SANCTION_DATE,LODGE_REF_NO, to_char(LODGE_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as LODGE_DATE ,DROPPED_REF_NO,to_char(DROPPED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DROPPED_DATE,DEFFERRED_DETAILS,INOUT_PROPOSALCREATED_BY,to_char(INOUT_PROPOSALCREATED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as INOUT_PROPOSALCREATED_DATE, to_char(DEFERRED_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DEFERRED_DATE from INWARD_OUTWARDPROPOSAL P,INWARD I where I.INWARD_REF_NO=P.INWARD_REF_NO and INWARD_TYPEOFINWARD='^' ^
select * from npausr.vw_ots_writeoff
